title: The Talbiyah
description: The sacred chant of pilgrims — a powerful declaration of devotion and response to Allah's call.
text: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، إِنَّ الْحَمْدَ وَالنِّعْمَةَ لَكَ وَالْمُلْكَ، لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ
translation: Here I am, O Allah, here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am. Verily all praise and blessings are Yours, and all sovereignty. You have no partner.
context: Recite continuously while in Ihram until beginning Tawaf

title: Dua During Tawaf
description: Supplications to recite while circumambulating the Kaaba during Tawaf.
text: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
translation: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
context: Recite between the Yemeni corner and the Black Stone during each circuit

title: The History of the Kaaba
description: A guided audio journey through the sacred history of the Kaaba, from Prophet Ibrahim to the present day.
context: Listen while viewing the Kaaba or during quiet moments of reflection

title: Dua When Drinking Zamzam
description: The blessed dua to recite when drinking the sacred Zamzam water.
text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا وَاسِعًا وَشِفَاءً مِنْ كُلِّ دَاءٍ
translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, abundant provision, and cure from every illness.
context: Recite before drinking Zamzam water, while facing the Kaaba

title: Story of Hajar and Safa-Marwa
description: The moving story of Hajar's search for water between Safa and Marwa — the origin of the Sa'i ritual.
context: Listen before performing Sa'i to connect with the spirit of this ritual

title: The Day of Arafat
description: Understanding the profound significance of standing at Arafat — the greatest day of Hajj.
context: Listen before the 9th of Dhul Hijjah to prepare spiritually for Arafat
